text: General chemical structure of a sulfanilide A sulfonanilide group is functional group that is a type of sulfonamide group which contains a sulfur atom bonded to two oxygen, one carbon atom, and one nitrogen contained within a derivative of aniline.Wujiang Zhenze Xinmin Chemical Auxiliaries Factory: "Product name — 2-Aminophenol-4-(2-carboxy)sulfonanilide" Intermediates for Dyes and Pesticides — Products. (2006). ==References== Category:Functional groups Category:Sulfonamides
title: Sulfonanilide
